text: Antidepressant not working anymoreI have been taking Lexapro for the past   months and  while it certainly wasn t a miracle cure  it was helping a lot  I felt less anxious and depressed  I no longer woke up thinking about suicide and I could leave the house without worrying about a catastrophic fire the would kill my cat  In the past couple weeks  though  I have felt old anxieties creeping back  I have had to block out certain thoughts because they were triggering me and found myself becoming fearful of leaving the house again  Last night  my suicidal thoughts came back with force  I have been up all night pondering suicide  I ve decided that  as soon as my relief staff gets in at  am  I m going to the ER  But I must admit to feeling a bit dismayed  After   years of psychiatry and therapy  I finally found a drug that was working and then it quits on me in less than   months  Does have any advice for me to keep me from spiralling while I wait for my relief to get in  Thanks
